meanings.sent1: The deterrers in the forest kept the animals away.
meanings.sent2: The deterrers warned people not to enter the restricted area.
meanings.sent3: The deterrers decided to dress up as scarecrows to deter the birds.
meanings.sent4: The deterrers stood like statues, casting a shadow of fear over the intruders.
meanings.sent5: The deterrers' presence loomed large, preventing any unwanted visitors.

meanings.definition: deterrers: those who deter or discourage
meanings.sent1: The deterrers at the meeting convinced others not to take unnecessary risks.
meanings.sent2: The deterrers in the group always had a way of making people think twice.
meanings.sent3: The deterrers joked that they were the 'dream crushers' of the team.
meanings.sent4: The deterrers' words were like barriers, stopping any enthusiasm in its tracks.
meanings.sent5: The deterrers' frowns were enough to make anyone reconsider their actions.
